title: How to Earn Play Coins on the Nintendo 3DS

steps.headline: Keep your Nintendo 3DS in sleep mode.
steps.description: In other words, the 3DS should be on but closed.

steps.headline: Walk around with your 3DS.
steps.description: Going shopping with your mom? Taking a stroll around the neighborhood? Take it with you! You should keep it in your pocket or purse while you walk.

steps.headline: Open your 3DS every once in a while to see how many steps you have accumulated.
steps.description: The steps counter is at the top on the top screen. Note that 1 Play Coin = 100 steps, so in order to get 10 Play Coins you will need at least 1,000 steps.

steps.headline: Once you get 10 Play Coins, go to Settings.
steps.description: From there, set the date and time to a past date so you will be able to get more Play Coins. This is because the maximum number of Play Coins you can get every day is 10.

steps.headline: Repeat the steps above until you have all the Play Coins you want.

text: Keep your Nintendo 3DS in sleep mode. In other words, the 3DS should be on but closed. Walk around with your 3DS. Going shopping with your mom? Taking a stroll around the neighborhood? Take it with you! You should keep it in your pocket or purse while you walk. Open your 3DS every once in a while to see how many steps you have accumulated. The steps counter is at the top on the top screen. Note that 1 Play Coin = 100 steps, so in order to get 10 Play Coins you will need at least 1,000 steps. Once you get 10 Play Coins, go to Settings. From there, set the date and time to a past date so you will be able to get more Play Coins. This is because the maximum number of Play Coins you can get every day is 10. Repeat the steps above until you have all the Play Coins you want.
